meanings.definition: A Greek pastry filled with cheese.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious tyropitas at the Greek festival.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells freshly baked tyropitas every morning.
meanings.sent3: The tyropitas told a cheesy joke to the spanakopitas.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly baked tyropitas.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the golden tyropitas filled the kitchen with a savory scent.

meanings.sent1: We ordered a dozen tyropitas for the party.
meanings.sent2: The tyropitas were a hit among the guests.
meanings.sent3: The tyropitas lined up neatly on the platter, ready to be devoured.
meanings.sent4: The tyropitas danced gracefully on the serving tray.
meanings.sent5: The golden brown tyropitas glistened under the party lights.
